mapper.sql: ID, SERV_NAME, SERV_TYPE, BASESERV_TYPEID, SELFSERV_TYPEID, SERV_MANID, SERV_CONTENTID, SERV_TIMEID, STATE
mapper.select:
SELECT s.ID, s.BASESERV_TYPEID, s.SERV_NAME, s.SERV_MANID, m.SNAME, m.STEL, g.LONGITUDE, g.LATITUDE, t.ERVERSATIS, st.serv_time, s.STATE FROM tbl_attention a LEFT JOIN TBL_SERV s ON s.ID = a.SERVID LEFT JOIN tbl_serv_man m ON m.ID = s.SERV_MANID LEFT JOIN tbl_serv_man_gps g ON s.SERV_MANID = g.SERV_MANID LEFT JOIN tbl_satis t ON s.ID = t.SERID LEFT JOIN tbl_serv_time st ON s.SERV_TIMEID=st.ID
and a.OPENID=#{openid}

SELECT COUNT(a.ID) AS ID FROM tbl_attention a LEFT JOIN TBL_SERV s ON s.ID = a.SERVID LEFT JOIN tbl_serv_man m ON m.ID = s.SERV_MANID LEFT JOIN tbl_serv_man_gps g ON s.SERV_MANID = g.SERV_MANID LEFT JOIN tbl_satis t ON s.ID = t.SERID
and a.OPENID=#{openid}

SELECT s.ID, s.BASESERV_TYPEID, s.SERV_NAME, s.SERV_MANID, m.SNAME, m.STEL, g.LONGITUDE, g.LATITUDE, t.ERVERSATIS, st.serv_time, s.STATE FROM tbl_recommend r LEFT JOIN TBL_SERV s ON s.ID=r.SERVID LEFT JOIN tbl_serv_man m ON m.ID = s.SERV_MANID LEFT JOIN tbl_serv_man_gps g ON s.SERV_MANID = g.SERV_MANID LEFT JOIN tbl_satis t ON s.ID = t.SERID LEFT JOIN tbl_serv_time st ON s.SERV_TIMEID=st.ID
and r.OPENID=#{openid}

SELECT COUNT(r.ID) AS ID FROM tbl_recommend r LEFT JOIN TBL_SERV s ON s.ID=r.SERVID LEFT JOIN tbl_serv_man m ON m.ID = s.SERV_MANID LEFT JOIN tbl_serv_man_gps g ON s.SERV_MANID = g.SERV_MANID LEFT JOIN tbl_satis t ON s.ID = t.SERID
and r.OPENID=#{openid}

SELECT s.ID, s.BASESERV_TYPEID, s.SERV_NAME, s.SERV_MANID, m.SNAME, m.STEL, g.LONGITUDE, g.LATITUDE, t.ERVERSATIS, m.SERV_ADDRESS, st.serv_time, s.STATE, s.SERV_CONTENTID FROM TBL_SERV s LEFT JOIN tbl_serv_man m ON m.ID = s.SERV_MANID LEFT JOIN tbl_serv_man_gps g ON s.SERV_MANID = g.SERV_MANID LEFT JOIN tbl_satis t ON s.ID = t.SERID LEFT JOIN tbl_serv_time st ON s.SERV_TIMEID=st.ID
and t.ID=#{id}

select
distinct
from tbl_serv
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_serv
ID,
SERV_NAME,
SERV_TYPE,
BASESERV_TYPEID,
SELFSERV_TYPEID,
SERV_MANID,
SERV_CONTENTID,
SERV_TIMEID,
STATE,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{servName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{servType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{baseservTypeid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{selfservTypeid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{servManid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{servContentid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{servTimeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
mapper.update:
update tbl_serv
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERV_NAME = #{record.servName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERV_TYPE = #{record.servType,jdbcType=CHAR},
BASESERV_TYPEID = #{record.baseservTypeid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SELFSERV_TYPEID = #{record.selfservTypeid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERV_MANID = #{record.servManid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERV_CONTENTID = #{record.servContentid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERV_TIMEID = #{record.servTimeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=TINYINT},

update tbl_serv set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SERV_NAME = #{record.servName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERV_TYPE = #{record.servType,jdbcType=CHAR}, BASESERV_TYPEID = #{record.baseservTypeid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SELFSERV_TYPEID = #{record.selfservTypeid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SERV_MANID = #{record.servManid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SERV_CONTENTID = #{record.servContentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SERV_TIMEID = #{record.servTimeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATE = #{record.state,jdbcType=TINYINT}

update tbl_serv
SERV_NAME = #{servName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERV_TYPE = #{servType,jdbcType=CHAR},
BASESERV_TYPEID = #{baseservTypeid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SELFSERV_TYPEID = #{selfservTypeid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERV_MANID = #{servManid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERV_CONTENTID = #{servContentid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERV_TIMEID = #{servTimeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tbl_serv set SERV_NAME = #{servName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERV_TYPE = #{servType,jdbcType=CHAR}, BASESERV_TYPEID = #{baseservTypeid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SELFSERV_TYPEID = #{selfservTypeid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SERV_MANID = #{servManid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SERV_CONTENTID = #{servContentid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SERV_TIMEID = #{servTimeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
